meanings.sent1: The cat will vamoose when it hears a loud noise.
meanings.sent2: I need to vamoose from this boring party soon.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel decided to vamoose when it saw a dog approaching.
meanings.sent4: The magician made the rabbit vamoose in a puff of smoke.
meanings.sent5: The kids were told to vamoose from the playground before it got dark.

meanings.sent1: His sudden vamoose surprised everyone at the meeting.
meanings.sent2: The train's vamoose was delayed due to bad weather.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected vamoose of the boss left the employees puzzled.
meanings.sent4: The spaceship's vamoose into space was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent5: The bird's vamoose from the nest marked the beginning of spring.

meanings.sent1: If you don't like it here, you can vamoose anytime.
meanings.sent2: The annoying salesperson wouldn't vamoose despite my hints.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous raccoon refused to vamoose from the garbage cans.
meanings.sent4: The dark clouds made the picnic crowd vamoose quickly.
meanings.sent5: The smell of the skunk made us vamoose in a hurry.
